data.eml:eml: Eight new species of Batrisodes Reitter from China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiang, Ri-Xin, Yin, Zi-Wei (2017): Eight new species of Batrisodes Reitter from China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae). ZooKeys 694: 11-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.694.13802, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.694.13802
